spryng_general.label: Spryng Payments - General
spryng_general.comment:
Spryng Payments. This plugin allows you to process payments using CreditCard, iDEAL, PayPal, SOFORT, Klarna and more.
Visit Spryng		SupportLogin to the Dashboard

heading_settings.label: Settings
heading_settings.comment: Configure the general Spryng Payment Payment status and Payment Icons.

order_status_pending.label: Status Pending
order_status_pending.comment: Set the order status before the customer is redirected to Payment Gateway

order_status_processing.label: Status Processing
order_status_processing.comment: Set the order status for Completed Payments

invoice_notify.label: Send Invoice Email
invoice_notify.comment: Set the notification for to Notify the customer with the Invoice

merchant_reference.label: Merchant Reference
merchant_reference.comment: The merchant references described the environment in which a transaction is processed.

heading_debug.label: Debug
heading_debug.comment: Especially for Developers you can enable the Debug mode.

debug.label: Debug request
debug.comment: When activated the debug file will be located in: var/log/spryng.log

organisation.label: Organisation
organisation.comment: Select the organisation for which you'd like to process payments.

account.label: Account ID
account.comment: With this setting, you can select the account with the proper configurations for this gateway.

heading_limit.label: Limit
heading_limit.comment: Especially for Developers you can enable the Debug mode.

organisation.comment: Select the organisation for which you'd like to process payments.

account.label: Account ID
account.comment: With this setting, you can select the account with the proper configurations for this gateway.
